recipes.name: Chicken Tikka Masala
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs
instructions: Gather all ingredients. Place chicken in a bowl. Drizzle vegetable oil over chicken; toss to coat.
Whisk together salt, garam masala, cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and cardamom in a small bowl.
Place the skillet with chicken drippings over medium-high heat. Stir onion into the skillet
Pour crushed tomatoes into the skillet. Bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off of the bottom of the skillet with a wooden spoon.

recipes.name: Tacos
instructions: Combine chicken broth and taco seasoning mix in a bowl.
Place chicken in a slow cooker. Pour chicken broth mixture over chicken.
Cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours. Shred chicken.

recipes.name: Pesto Pizza
instructions: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
Spread pesto on pizza crust. Top with tomato, bell pepper, olives, red onion, artichoke hearts, and feta cheese.
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and browned, 8 to 10 minutes.

recipes.name: Pad Thai
instructions: Place rice noodles into a large bowl and cover with several inches of room temperature water
Whisk 1/2 cup sugar, vinegar, fish sauce, and tamarind paste together in a saucepan over medium heat.
Heat 1 tablespoon oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken; cook and stir until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 5 to 7 minutes.
Heat remaining 1 tablespoon oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Stir in tamarind mixture, 1 1/2 tablespoons sugar, and salt; cook until noodles are tender, 3 to 5 minutes.

recipes.name: Spaghetti
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium until shimmering.
Add wine and reduce heat to medium-low.
Add tomatoes and chile and cook, stirring to coat, until tomatoes begin to burst
Meanwhile, cook pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water.
Using tongs, transfer pasta to pot with sauce.
Transfer pasta to a platter. Top with more Parmesan.

recipes.name: Kebab
ingredients: ½ cup fresh mint leaves, finely chopped
instructions: Mix ground lamb, onions, mint, cilantro, ginger paste, and chile paste together in a large bowl.
Divide lamb mixture into 8 equal portions.
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and brush the grate liberally with oil.
Cook skewers on the preheated grill, turning frequently, until nicely browned on all sides

recipes.name: Sushi
instructions: Soak rice for 4 hours. Drain rice and cook in a rice cooker with 2 cups of water.
Immediately after rice is cooked, mix in rice wine vinegar; spread rice on a plate until completely cool.
Place 1 sheet of seaweed on a bamboo mat; press a thin layer of cool rice on seaweed, leaving at least a 1/2 inch top and bottom edge of the seaweed uncovered.
Slightly wet the top edge of seaweed; roll up tightly from the bottom to the top edge with the help of the bamboo mat.

recipes.name: Korean BBQ Beef
instructions: In a large resealable plastic bag, combine beef with garlic, pear, green onions, soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, rice wine, sesame seeds, fresh ginger, and ground black pepper. Seal, and refrigerate for 2 to 3 hours.
Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source. Brush oil over grill pan. Place beef on pan. Cook, turning to brown evenly, for 3 to 6 minutes, or until done.
